scripts.docker: docker build . -t dota2classic/matchmaking:api-gateway && docker push dota2classic/matchmaking:api-gateway
scripts.apigen:gameserver:prod: openapi-generator-cli  generate --model-name-prefix Gameserver  --import-mappings Dota_Map --import-mappings BanReason --import-mappings AchievementKey --import-mappings MatchmakingMode=1 --import-mappings Dota_GameMode=2 --skip-validate-spec -i http://62.122.215.162:5003/api-json -g typescript-fetch -t ./.openapi-generator/typescript-fetch-swr -o ./generated --additional-properties useSingleRequestParameter=false && rm -rf src/generated-api/gameserver && cp -r ./generated src/generated-api/gameserver && rm -rf ./generated && node scripts/after-codegen.js gameserver
scripts.apigen:gameserver: openapi-generator-cli  generate --model-name-prefix Gameserver  --import-mappings MatchAccessLevel  --import-mappings PlayerAspect --import-mappings Dota_Map --import-mappings BanReason --import-mappings AchievementKey --import-mappings MatchmakingMode=1 --import-mappings Dota_GameMode=2 --skip-validate-spec -i http://localhost:5003/api-json -g typescript-fetch -t ./.openapi-generator/typescript-fetch-swr -o ./generated --additional-properties useSingleRequestParameter=false && rm -rf src/generated-api/gameserver && cp -r ./generated src/generated-api/gameserver && rm -rf ./generated && node scripts/after-codegen.js gameserver
scripts.apigen:forum: openapi-generator-cli  generate --model-name-prefix Forum --import-mappings Role  --import-mappings BanReason --import-mappings ThreadType=1 --import-mappings Dota_GameMode=2  --import-mappings MatchmakingMode=1  --skip-validate-spec -i http://localhost:6009/api-json -g typescript-fetch -t ./.openapi-generator/typescript-fetch-swr -o ./generated --additional-properties useSingleRequestParameter=false && rm -rf src/generated-api/forum && cp -r ./generated src/generated-api/forum && rm -rf ./generated && node scripts/after-codegen.js forum
scripts.apigen:matchmaker: openapi-generator-cli  generate --model-name-prefix Matchmaker --import-mappings MatchmakingMode=1 --skip-validate-spec -i http://localhost:7777/api-json -g typescript-fetch -t ./.openapi-generator/typescript-fetch-swr -o ./generated --additional-properties useSingleRequestParameter=false && rm -rf src/generated-api/matchmaker && cp -r ./generated src/generated-api/matchmaker && rm -rf ./generated && node scripts/after-codegen.js matchmaker
scripts.apigen:tournament: openapi-generator-cli generate --skip-validate-spec -i http://localhost:6100/api-json -g typescript-axios -o ./generated --config tournament-openapi-generate.json && rm -rf src/generated-api/tournament && cp -r ./generated src/generated-api/tournament && rm -rf ./generated
